results.description: Brings an inevitable judgment upon all enemies, stunning them and decreasing their Defense for 1 turn. The inflicted damage is proportionate to the enemy's MAX HP.

results.description: Meteorites of doomsday fall on to the enemies and the inflicted damage increases with time. Stuns the enemy for 1 turn if the enemy is under continuous damage.
